title: App crashes when clicked on CountButton
body:
###### Reproduction Steps

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/76252038/120691892-ab35dc80-c4c4-11eb-81d8-7594cf616e97.mp4


###### Debug info
```
AnkiDroid Version = 2.16alpha00

Android Version = 11

Manufacturer = realme

Model = RMX3085

Hardware = mt6785

Webview User Agent = Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 11; RMX3085 Build/RP1A.200720.011; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/87.0.4280.141 Mobile Safari/537.36

ACRA UUID = 5edea3c8-99cc-4753-8ece-03d86a74ada5

Scheduler = std

Crash Reports Enabled = false

DatabaseV2 Enabled = true

```


###### crash report########


```
2021-06-03 23:47:49.789 19095-19095/com.ichi2.anki E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
    Process: com.ichi2.anki, PID: 19095
    java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to start activity ComponentInfo{com.ichi2.anki/com.ichi2.anki.StudyOptionsActivity}: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout.setDrawerShadow(int, int)' on a null object reference
        at android.app.ActivityThread.performLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:3730)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.handleLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:3898)
        at android.app.servertransaction.LaunchActivityItem.execute(LaunchActivityItem.java:85)
        at android.app.servertransaction.TransactionExecutor.executeCallbacks(TransactionExecutor.java:135)
        at android.app.servertransaction.TransactionExecutor.execute(TransactionExecutor.java:95)
        at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:2323)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:106)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:255)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:8194)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:632)
        at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:1049)
     Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout.setDrawerShadow(int, int)' on a null object reference
        at com.ichi2.anki.NavigationDrawerActivity.initNavigationDrawer(NavigationDrawerActivity.java:114)
        at com.ichi2.anki.StudyOptionsActivity.onCreate(StudyOptionsActivity.java:51)
        at android.app.Activity.performCreate(Activity.java:8151)
        at android.app.Activity.performCreate(Activity.java:8135)
        at android.app.Instrumentation.callActivityOnCreate(Instrumentation.java:1309)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.performLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:3699)

```

- [x] I have searched for similar existing issues here and on the user forum
- [x] (Optional) I have confirmed the issue is not resolved in the latest alpha release ([instructions](https://docs.ankidroid.org/manual.html#betaTesting))
